request.description:
#### APIs Used for Creation of Reserved Create GSI
##### Login as Solution Developer - usercco - Used to Login to the Tenant (Both as Admin or User) - This is a Post Request which takes Form Data (Username,Password) - Returns Access Token and Refresh Token - Access Token is used as an Authentication Header for the Request that need authentication - Refresh Token is used to Logout as well as Create New Access Token after expiry.
#### Create GSI - Reserved Create Sol - Used to Create a new GSI with some name - This is a Post Request with content-type as JSON. - Returns An Named GSI with id and dsdId will be Draft V1.0
#### Create Entity - Entity Reserved - Used to create an Entity with Required Attributes - Attributes Types (name -> text , email -> email,age -> number) - Returns the Entity that is Created as Draft V1.0
#### Create CU1 - Reserved Create - This API is used to Create a Reserved Search CU - Reserved_Ent is added to both Physical and TriggerCES Layer - Membership Criteria is Added to Email Attribute - Returns the Draft State CU V1.0
#### Create CU2 - Display - This API is used to Create a Normal Display CU - Reserved_Ent is added to Information Layer - Returns the Draft State CU V1.0
#### Add CUs To GSI (DCD Mappings) - Added Reserved Create and Display (Normal Cu) to the GSI - And Entity Level DCD Mappings are Made - Reserved Create (Trigger CES) -> Display CU (Information Layer) - Returns Status as DRAFT V1.0
#### Finish GSI - Reserved Create Sol - This API is used to Finish the GSI Create - Returns the Status as READY V1.0
#### Send Notification for Review - Usercco1 - This API is used to send the GSI for review to usercco1 - Returns Confirmation Message Whether Message Sent or Not Successfully.
#### Logout Solution Dev - usercco - This API is Used to Log Out of the Tenant as usercco
#### Login as Reviewer - usercco1 - Used to Login to the Tenant (Both as Admin or User)
#### Approve the GSI - Reserved Create Sol - This API is used to Approve the GSI that is been send for Review
#### Logout as Reviewer - usercco1 - This API is Used to Log Out of the Tenant as usercco1
#### Get GSI Details - Reserved Create Sol - API is Used to Get all the Logic that is implemented with in the GSI - Returns Status as "Approved" V1.0
#### Publish the GSI - Reserved Create Sol - API is used Publish the GSI - Returns the Status as "PUBLISHED" V1.0
#### Start Execution of GSI - This API is used to Initiate the Execution of GSI that is Create - This Returns Reserved Search CU Details
#### Execute CU1 - Reserved Create - This API is Used to execute Reserved Create CU
#### Execute CU2 - Display CU - This API is used to Execute Display CU

body.raw:
{
    "dsdId": null,
    "agents": [
        {
            "agentType": "human"
        }
    ],
    "attributeDesignRights": {},
    "attributeTransactionRights": {},
    "cuType": "BASIC",
    "dcd": [],
    "description": "{{SolutionName1}}",
    "designTimeRights": [
        {
            "name": "{{RoleCCO}}",
            "rightHolderId": {{CCORoleId}},
            "rightHolderType": "ROLE",
            "rightHolderName": "{{RoleCCO}}",
            "decisionRight": true,
            "informationRight": true,
            "executionRight": false
        }
    ],
    "displayName": "{{SolutionName1}}",
    "entityDesignRights": {},
    "entityTransactionRights": {},
    "exceptionCUList": [],
    "gsiList": [],
    "layers": [],
    "mindCUList": [],
    "name": "{{SolutionName1}}",
    "nextTriggerSet": [],
    "ontology": [
        {
            "id": "common",
            "name": "common",
            "displayName": "Common",
            "level": 1
        }
    ],
    "ownerId": {{UserCCOId}},
    "solutionLogic": [],
    "status": "DRAFT",
    "dsdStatus": "DRAFT",
    "txnTimeRights": [
        {
            "name": "{{RoleCCO}}",
            "rightHolderId": {{CCORoleId}},
            "rightHolderType": "ROLE",
            "rightHolderName": "{{RoleCCO}}",
            "decisionRight": false,
            "informationRight": true,
            "executionRight": true
        }
    ],
    "author": {
        "name": "{{UserCCO}}"
    },
    "keywords": [
        ""
    ],
    "isNameUpdated": true
}

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json().message).to.eq("No active review process found for BET id "+ pm.variables.get("SolutionId1"));
